items.sentence: Would you like to ask anyone else a question?
Would you mind if I wait until Tom gets back?
Would you mind if we spoke in French instead?
It\'s a crime the way he treats his children.
It\'s a pity that Mary has no sense of humor.
It\'s about thirty minutes from here on foot.
It\'s at least three hundred miles from here.
It\'s been my dream since I was a little boy.
For one thing, I couldn\'t afford to do that.
Frankly speaking, I don\'t like your haircut.
Doesn\'t anyone want to know why we\'re here?
Don\'t act like you don\'t know how to dance.
When I first met Tom, he was just a teenager.
When I got up this morning, I had a headache.
When I heard what happened, I started crying.
When I try to walk, I get an awful pain here.
When I was taking a bath, the telephone rang.
Tom was the first one to enter the classroom.
Tom was the last one to turn in his homework.
Tom was the one who gave Mary her first kiss.
